In England, in the seven days to 22 December, there were 647,595 new confirmed cases (1,145.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 December, there were 418,679 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 55% (228,916 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 27 December is 10,429,274 (18,442.5 cases per 100,000 population).
